title: Divine Polki Diamond Lakshmi Haaram with Emerald Accents
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases traditional South Indian craftsmanship with a modern twist. The Polki diamonds are meticulously set in a closed setting, showcasing their natural beauty. Delicate emeralds are interspersed along the chain, adding vibrant color. The central pendant features a Lakshmi devi motif crafted in detailed gold nakshi work, surrounded by a halo of Polki diamonds and a border of lustrous freshwater pearls. The guttapusalu (pearl droplet) inspired design adds a timeless elegance.
colors: Hint of red from ruby in the pendant.
occasions: and other significant traditional events. Also suitable for high-end festive occasions and adding a touch of regal elegance to modern attire.
description: A masterpiece of traditional South Indian jewelry, this Haaram is a timeless investment. The use of uncut Polki diamonds highlights the raw beauty of nature, while the Lakshmi motif brings blessings and prosperity. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a long-lasting shine. This piece is a perfect blend of cultural heritage and sophisticated design, making it a cherished heirloom.
